name: Guadeloupe
introduction: Guadeloupe a French overseas region is an island group in the southern Caribbean Sea. Resembling a butterfly its 2 largest islands are separated by the Salée River. Hilly Grande-Terre Island has long beaches and sugarcane fields. On Basse-Terre Island Parc National de la Guadeloupe encompasses Carbet Falls and the volcano La Grande Soufrière. Smaller islands include Marie-Galante and La Désirade.
overview: Guadeloupe a French overseas region is an island group in the southern Caribbean Sea. Resembling a butterfly its 2 largest islands are separated by the Salée River. Hilly Grande-Terre Island has long beaches and sugarcane fields. On Basse-Terre Island Parc National de la Guadeloupe encompasses Carbet Falls and the volcano La Grande Soufrière. Smaller islands include Marie-Galante and La Désirade.

languages.name: North Levantine Arabic
languages.area: Also in Antigua and Barbuda, Argentina, Belize, Cyprus, Dominican Republic, Egypt, French Guiana, Israel, Jamaica, Lebanon, Mali, Puerto Rico, Suriname, Trinidad and Tobago, Turkey (Asia).

languages.name: Guadeloupean Creole French
languages.location: Creole Languages of the Eastern Caribbean
languages.area: Eastern St. Barthélemy, Marie Galante islands. Also in Martinique.

languages.name: Haitian
languages.location: Creole Languages of the Northern Caribbean
languages.area: Widespread. Also in Bahamas, Canada, Cayman Islands, Dominican Republic, French Guiana, Guadeloupe, Puerto Rico, Turks and Caicos Islands, United States.

languages.name: Tamil
languages.area: Tamil Nadu and neighboring states. Also in Bahrain, Canada, Fiji, Germany, Malaysia (Peninsular), Mauritius, Netherlands, Qatar, Réunion, Singapore, South Africa, Sri Lanka, Thailand, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States.
